Package org.apache.spark.util.collection.unsafe.sort

Class UnsafeSorterSpillWriter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.spark.util.collection.unsafe.sort.UnsafeSorterSpillWriter
public final class UnsafeSorterSpillWriter extends Object
Spills a list of sorted records to disk. Spill files have the following format: [# of records (int)] [[len (int)][prefix (long)][data (bytes)]...]

  • Method Details

    • write

      public void write(Object baseObject, long baseOffset, int recordLength, long keyPrefix) throws IOException
      Write a record to a spill file.
      Parameters:
      baseObject - the base object / memory page containing the record
      baseOffset - the base offset which points directly to the record data.
      recordLength - the length of the record.
      keyPrefix - a sort key prefix
      Throws:
      IOException
